Iowa Department of Administrative Services. (2023, November 20). State of Iowa salary book: Government employees. State of Iowa. https://data.iowa.gov

A data set including people's name, gender, working position, their agreed upon salary when hired, ther total salry paid in a year, and lastly any expenses involving transportation or substinence meaning food. It was created by the iowas department of administrative services.


Fiscal Year: fiscal year
Name: names of participants
Gender: sex of particapnts
Position: Work positions 
Base Salary: payment agreement upon hire 
Total Salary Paid: Paid for a year
Travel and Substinence: Transportation and food
